OOC: I just talked to shomin on the phone, and he will be returning to the 
RPG tonight or tomorrow.  He is letting me keep Hellbat, but he is taking 
back the Keepers(Which is good, since hes got big plans).

Also, Jason Lind, you need to respond to Herald's message, and RYO, answer 
ratchet's question(whether he can help fix the ark).

--part1_c3.b6da616.27547c95_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

<HTML><FONT  SIZE=2>OOC: I just talked to shomin on the phone, and he will be returning to the <BR>RPG tonight or tomorrow.  He is letting me keep Hellbat, but he is taking <BR>back the Keepers(Which is good, since hes got big plans).
<BR>
<BR>Also, Jason Lind, you need to respond to Herald's message, and RYO, answer <BR>ratchet's question(whether he can help fix the ark).</FONT></HTML>

--part1_c3.b6da616.27547c95_boundary--
